guicomponents
Class GCScheme

java.lang.Object
  guicomponents.GCScheme

public class GCScheme
extends java.lang.Object

Stores all the colour information for the GUI components into a scheme. This class has scope for further work to provide more customisable schemes.

Author:
Peter Lager
